login.title: Sign in via Telegram
login.subtitle: To use the app you need to open it from our Telegram bot. This ensures your account is linked to your Telegram ID securely.
login.hint: After tapping the button in Telegram, use the WebApp button to open the app ‚Äî you'll be signed in automatically.

dashboard.profit: Profit (net of fees is shown in bot)

connect.title: Connect / Update API keys
connect.note: Enter your API keys and trading balance.

deposit.title: Deposit management
deposit.saved: Added {{amount}} USDT. Please transfer the transaction amount via Bybit internal transfer to UID: 118410288, or via Binance Pay ID: 205039637. New deposit: {{new}} USDT

hero.title: Connect your exchange account and track your bot performance
hero.subtitle: IpotechTrade connects to your Binance or Bybit account via API (no withdrawal permissions). View profit, deposit and trading balance in your private dashboard.

benefit1.title: Non-custodial
benefit1.desc: Funds stay on your exchange. API keys are stored encrypted on our server and used only for spot trading.

benefit2.title: Transparent PnL
benefit2.desc: Your profit is calculated from closed deals coming directly from your exchange-linked records.

benefit3.title: Simple setup
benefit3.desc: Authorize via Telegram, paste API keys once, set bot balance ‚Äî that's it.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.text: Log in to the app with your Telegram account or open it via our Telegram bot.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.text: Choose exchange (Binance or Bybit) and add API keys (Spot only; withdrawals disabled).

step3.label: Step 3
step3.text: Set the amount the bot may trade (USDT).

step4.label: Step 4
step4.text: Track profit and deposit in your dashboard.

landing.note: Subscribe to our Telegram channel: https://t.me/ipotechTrade

hero.title: IpotechTrade ‚Äî details
hero.subtitle: Connect your Binance or Bybit account via API with Spot-only permissions. You control the trading amount, the bot executes the strategy, and PnL & deposit are visible in your dashboard.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.text: Sign in via Telegram ‚Äî the web app opens authenticated.

step2.label: Step 2
step2.text: Choose an exchange (Binance or Bybit) and add API keys with Spot-only rights. Whitelisting IP is recommended.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.text: Set the USDT amount the bot may trade. You can change it anytime in Settings.

step4.label: Step 4
step4.text: Track closed PnL and your service deposit in the dashboard.

b1.title: Non-custodial
b1.text: Funds remain on your exchange; API withdrawal rights are disabled.

b2.title: Transparent PnL
b2.text: Profit is based on closed trades associated with your account.

b3.title: Fast setup
b3.text: Add keys once, set trade amount ‚Äî done.

security.title: Security & API permissions

s1.title: Spot only
s1.text: Keys are created with spot trading permission only. Withdrawals are not allowed.

s2.title: IP whitelist
s2.text: We recommend restricting keys to a trusted IP listed in the instructions.

s3.title: Encrypted at rest
s3.text: API keys are stored encrypted on the server and used solely for trading.

s4.title: You stay in control
s4.text: Revoke keys on the exchange at any time ‚Äî trading stops immediately.

security.note: Algorithmic trading involves market risk and does not guarantee profit. Invest responsibly.

fees.title: Deposit & fees
fees.p1: A separate in-service deposit is used to pay our fee. Balance and top-ups are available in your dashboard.
fees.p2: You configure the bot‚Äôs USDT trading amount, and you can start/stop trading as needed.
fees.p3: Payment details are shown directly in the top-up dialog; transactions are recorded in the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù section.

ref.title: Referral program
ref.text: Invite friends using your Telegram referral link: newcomers receive a deposit bonus, and you get a percentage of their deposit top-ups.

q1.a: No. Keys are issued without withdrawal rights. Funds remain on your exchange.

q2.a: Binance and Bybit. New venues will be announced.

q3.a: It depends on market conditions and settings; for Bybit the guide suggests ~500 USDT as a practical baseline.

q4.a: In the dashboard‚Äôs Profit card ‚Äî based on closed trades including the service fee.

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.text: Support: @IpotechSupport on Telegram. For partnerships/integrations, message support and we‚Äôll reach out.

signin.title: Sign in via Telegram
signin.subtitle: To use the dashboard and settings, open this app from our Telegram bot. This securely verifies your identity.
signin.hint: After opening the bot, tap ‚ÄúOpen App‚Äù. If you‚Äôre already inside Telegram WebApp, just press ‚ÄúReload‚Äù.

profitChart.title: Cumulative Profit Chart
profitChart.subtitle: Each trade result is added to the running total.

keysGuide.title: Guide: creating API keys for Bybit & Binance
keysGuide.ipText: use this IP when creating your keys: {{ip}}

common.title: General recommendations
common.item1: Create a dedicated key pair specifically for the bot.
common.item2: Enable only trading permissions. Withdrawals must remain disabled.
common.item3: Always enable IP allowlist and add {{ip}}.
common.item4: Keep your keys secret. Never share your secret key.

bybit.step1: Open Bybit ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí API Management / Create API key.
bybit.step2: Key type: System generated (or the integrations option).
bybit.step3: Permissions: enable Trade (spot/derivatives as needed), disable Withdraw.
bybit.step6: Save API Key and Secret ‚Äî the secret is shown only once.

binance.step1: Open Binance ‚Üí Profile ‚Üí API Management / Create API key.
binance.step2: Give it a clear name (e.g., IpotechTrade Bot).
binance.step3: After creation, open key settings (Edit restrictions).
binance.step4: Check Enable Spot & Margin Trading (or required trading permissions).
binance.step5: Enable Restrict access to trusted IPs only and add {{ip}}.
binance.step7: Save API Key and Secret Key ‚Äî the secret is shown only once.

form.title: What to enter in the connection form
form.item3: Bot trading balance ‚Üí amount allocated for the bot (at least 500 USDT).

keysGuide.warning: If you see authorization or IP restriction errors, verify that {{ip}} is on the allowlist and permissions are set correctly.

referrals.title: Referral System
referrals.description: Here is your referral link. Share it with friends ‚Äî they get +50 USDT on deposit, and you earn 20% from their top-ups to your Bybit UID.

bybitUID.title: Bybit UID for Referral Payouts
bybitUID.desc: Enter your Bybit UID (6‚Äì20 digits only). 20% of your referrals' deposits will be sent here.

terms.title: User Agreement (Public Offer)
terms.content:
Irkutsk
Individual Entrepreneur: Garin Aleksei Anatolievich
Tax ID: 380807200448

1. General Provisions
1.1. This User Agreement (hereinafter ‚Äî ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) governs access and use of the IpotechTrade (iTrade) trading bot, available at itrade.studio and via Telegram bot @IpotechTradeBot.
1.2. Using the Service constitutes unconditional acceptance of this Agreement.
1.3. This Agreement is a public offer in accordance with the Civil Code of the Russian Federation. Acceptance of the offer is deemed complete upon User registration on the website or in the Telegram bot.

2. Terms and Definitions
Service / Trading Bot / Bot ‚Äî the IpotechTrade (iTrade) software product providing automated cryptocurrency trading on third-party exchanges (Bybit, Binance, etc.) according to predefined algorithms.
User ‚Äî an individual or legal entity registered in the Service using the trading bot.
Deposit ‚Äî a unit of account within the Service, required for trading access.
Profit ‚Äî the positive difference between the User‚Äôs balance after a trading cycle and the initial balance.
Referral Program ‚Äî a system for attracting new users with reward benefits for referrers.

3. Subject of the Agreement
3.1. The Administrator (IE Garin A.A.) grants the User access to the IpotechTrade (iTrade) trading bot for automated crypto-trading on supported exchanges.
3.2. IpotechTrade is not a broker, dealer, financial advisor, or licensed investment platform. The Service does not provide investment, legal, tax, or financial advice.

4. Deposit and Connection
4.1. To start, the User must register on the website or in Telegram and connect their exchange account (Bybit, Binance, etc.) by entering API keys.
4.2. Upon registration, the User receives a welcome deposit of 50 USDT (100 USDT if registered via a referral link). The welcome deposit cannot be withdrawn.
4.3. Deposit top-ups occur in two stages:
‚Ä¢ The User selects ‚ÄúTop up deposit‚Äù and specifies the desired amount.
‚Ä¢ Within 2 hours, the User must transfer the equivalent USDT amount to the Bot‚Äôs specified Bybit UID.
4.4. If no transfer is made within 2 hours, the payment request is canceled.
4.5. Deposits must remain positive. If a User‚Äôs deposit becomes negative, trading is suspended until it is replenished.

5. Referral Program
5.1. Each User may participate in the referral program and receive 20% of deposits made by referred users (excluding welcome bonuses).
5.2. Referred users receive a 100 USDT welcome deposit instead of 50 USDT.
5.3. Referral rewards are paid in USDT to the User‚Äôs Bybit UID specified in the Service.

6. Fees and Payments
6.1. The Administrator‚Äôs commission is 25% of the User‚Äôs profit earned through the trading bot.
6.2. The User transfers the commission amount to the Service‚Äôs deposit manually.
6.3. If the User‚Äôs deposit balance falls below zero, trading is paused until it becomes positive.

7. Rights and Obligations
7.1. The User agrees to:
‚Ä¢ provide accurate registration data;
‚Ä¢ not disclose account credentials;
‚Ä¢ when creating API keys, not allow asset withdrawals and whitelist the Service‚Äôs IP (as listed on the registration page);
‚Ä¢ manage their trading risks independently.
7.2. The Administrator ensures stable Service operation within technical limits.
7.3. The User may stop using the Service at any time. Funds remain in the User‚Äôs exchange account. To stop trading, simply delete API keys ‚Äî the Bot will lose access. The deposit balance will be frozen; deposited funds are non-refundable.

8. Liability
8.1. The User acknowledges and assumes all risks associated with crypto trading.
8.2. The Administrator is not responsible for any losses incurred by the User while using the Bot.
8.3. IpotechTrade does not guarantee profit and is not responsible for the performance of exchanges, APIs, or payment systems.
8.4. Each User is personally responsible for paying taxes on their income according to their country‚Äôs laws.

9. Privacy and Data Processing
9.1. IpotechTrade collects only the personal data necessary for Service operation (Telegram ID, email, API keys, deposits, and transaction info).
9.2. API secrets are encrypted and never shared with third parties unless required by law.
9.3. The User consents to personal data processing by accepting this Agreement.

10. Dispute Resolution
10.1. All disputes shall be resolved through negotiation.
10.2. If no settlement is reached, disputes are subject to the court at the Administrator‚Äôs place of registration.

11. Final Provisions
11.1. This Agreement enters into force upon User acceptance.
11.2. IpotechTrade may amend the Agreement unilaterally. The latest version is always available at itrade.studio.
11.3. Contact:
üìç Irkutsk
üìß nibellom@mail.ru
üí¨ Telegram: @ipotechtradesupport
